original_title: まみのこと覚えてる? ~高橋まみ復活作~
overview: A resurrection image of Mami Takahashi boasting tremendous popularity as a JK gravure idol. With Loriface and Honkara characters intact, eyes are nailed to a new "Takahashi Mami" who wore adults' sex appeal. Exposure is further up!
title: まみのこと覚えてる? ~高橋まみ復活作~
